#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	int n;
	long long int res;
	int k;
	cin>>t;
	long long int c[1001]={0};
	c[0]=1;
	c[1]=1;
	for (int i=2; i<=1000; i++)
    {
        for (int j=0,k=i-1; j<i; j++,k--)
        {
            c[i]=c[i]+(c[j]*c[k]);
    	}
    	c[i]=c[i]%10000;
    }
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		res=c[n-1];
		cout<<res<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
